title: Orange County helicopter crash: Huntington Beach PD Officer Nicholas Vella dies of injuries, 2nd officer in critical condition - KABC-TV
description: A 14-year veteran of Huntington Beach P.D. was killed and another officer was injured after a police helicopter crashed near Newport Beach.
content: NEWPORT BEACH, Calif. (KABC) -- A 14-year veteran of the Huntington Beach Police Department was killed and another officer was critically injured after a police helicopter crashed near Newport Beach â€¦ [+3874 chars]
